trans-unit.source: Specifies the types of security that can be used with the system-provided <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定可搭配系統提供之 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding" /> 使用的安全性類型。

trans-unit.source: Security in this context means message protection (integrity and confidentiality) as well as client and service authentication.
trans-unit.target: 此內容的安全性是指訊息保護 (完整性和機密性)，以及用戶端和服務驗證。

trans-unit.source: Actual protection requirements (the specific parts of SOAP messages that must be signed or signed and encrypted) are controlled through attributes on the service contract or through properties in the contract description.
trans-unit.target: 實際保護需求是指 SOAP 訊息中必須簽署或簽署加密並行的特定部分，而且會透過服務合約的屬性或透過合約描述中的屬性來控制。

trans-unit.source: Properties on the binding do not control what is being signed or encrypted: a binding only delivers the general capability of signing and encrypting.
trans-unit.target: 繫結上的屬性不會控制簽署或加密的內容，因為繫結只提供簽署與加密的一般功能。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> is None.
trans-unit.target: 預設行為<xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>為 None。

trans-unit.source: Security is provided using SOAP message security.
trans-unit.target: 系統會使用 SOAP 訊息安全性來提供安全性。

trans-unit.source: For the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding" />, the system requires that the server certificate be provided to the client separately.
trans-unit.target: 對於 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding" />，系統會要求另行對用戶端提供伺服器憑證。

trans-unit.source: The valid client credential types for this binding are <see langword="UserName" /> and <see langword="Certificate" />.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的有效用戶端認證類型為 <see langword="UserName" /> 和 <see langword="Certificate" />。

trans-unit.source: The SOAP message is not secured during transfer.
trans-unit.target: 傳輸期間的 SOAP 訊息是不安全的。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設行為。

trans-unit.source: Security is provided using HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: 系統會使用 HTTPS 來提供安全性。

trans-unit.source: The service must be configured with SSL certificates.
trans-unit.target: 而服務必須使用 SSL 憑證來設定。

trans-unit.source: The SOAP message is protected as a whole using HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 訊息是使用 HTTPS 進行整體保護。

trans-unit.source: The service is authenticated by the client using the service’s SSL certificate.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端會使用服務的 SSL 憑證來驗證服務，

trans-unit.source: The client authentication is controlled through the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType" />.
trans-unit.target: 而用戶端驗證則是透過 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType" /> 來控制。

trans-unit.source: This mode does not provide message integrity and confidentiality.
trans-unit.target: 這個模式不提供訊息完整性和機密性，

trans-unit.source: It provides only HTTP-based client authentication.
trans-unit.target: 只會提供 HTTP 架構的用戶端驗證。

trans-unit.source: Use this mode with caution.
trans-unit.target: 請小心使用這個模式，

trans-unit.source: It should be used in environments where the transfer security is being provided by other means (such as IPSec) and only client authentication is provided by the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 它應使用在以其他方式 (如 IPSec) 提供傳輸安全性，且 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 基礎結構只提供用戶端驗證的環境中。

trans-unit.source: Integrity, confidentiality and server authentication are provided by HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: 完整性、機密性與伺服器驗證都是經由 HTTPS 來提供。

trans-unit.source: The service must be configured with a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 服務必須使用憑證來設定。

trans-unit.source: Client authentication is provided by means of SOAP message security.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端驗證是透過 SOAP 訊息安全性的方式提供。

trans-unit.source: This mode is applicable when the user is authenticating with a UserName or Certificate credential and there is an existing HTTPS deployment for securing message transfer.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者是透過使用者名稱或憑證認證進行驗證，而且有現有的 HTTPS 部署來保護訊息傳輸的安全時，即適用此模式。
